Class FileAvailabilityVerifier

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.InputVerifier

                  edu.umaryland.igs.idea.FileFormatVerifier
                      edu.umaryland.igs.idea.FileAvailabilityVerifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class FileAvailabilityVerifier
extends FileFormatVerifier
implements Cloneable

FileAvailabilityVerifier, the degenerate FileFormatVerifier, simply requires that a file exist and be non-empty and readable. There are no restrictions on the files contents, but it may not be a directory.

Written:

Copyright (C) 2007, Amy Egan and Joana C. Silva.

All rights reserved.

Author:
Amy Egan
